backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile storage, booking request submission, and permission-checked admin/user access via an AccessControl mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and functionality of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide covering build steps, environment variables, domain setup, analytics, and version configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-powered stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, theming tokens, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint defining metadata, social tags, structured data, and runtime URL adjustments for the public site.
frontend/LIVE_URLS.md: Documentation of production URLs, canister IDs, deployment verification steps, and configuration notes.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to the site's sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing the homepage with weekly update frequency and highest priority.
frontend/SEO.md: Guide detailing SEO setup including meta tags, structured data, sitemap, robots.txt, and Google Search Console verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that tracks initial page view and renders header, landing page, and footer.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuickReque: Admin view fetching and displaying referee requests with copy‑to‑clipboard email formatting and error handling.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Reusable logo component rendering a static logo image at preset sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, navigation shortcuts, contact info, availability hours, and version/host details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with logo, navigation, mobile menu, and conditional admin link based on user permissions.
frontend/src/components/lead/ChatbotLead: Interactive chatbot widget guiding users through referee request submission with multi‑step form logic and analytics tracking.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact form section handling quick request submission, validation, clipboard copy actions, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Landing page hero with marketing text, stats, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Displays a step-by-step breakdown of how the service works with icons and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Lists offered officiating services and supported sports with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading persisted identity, handling login/logout, and exposing identity and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting referee and quick requests, checking admin status, and fetching all requests via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including color system, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the marketing landing page layout with hero, services, process, contact, admin view, and chatbot widgets.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/ga4.ts: Provides safe wrappers for GA4 analytics, including event, page view, and conversion tracking with graceful fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/publicSiteBaseUrl.ts: Utility for resolving and normalizing the public site base URL and hostname using env vars or window origin.
frontend/src/utils/siteVersion.ts: Returns the site version from an environment variable, defaulting to 8 if unset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, versioning requirements, and current feature requests.
